script_line.statement: import com.workpoint.common.util.TableID;[lf]import com.workpoint.common.data.JobNodeData;[lf]import com.workpoint.client.WorkItemEntry;[lf]import com.workpoint.client.Milestone;[lf]import com.workpoint.client.Job;[lf][lf]//def work = WorkItemEntry.queryByID(ClientContext, SymbolTable.symActInstID, SymbolTable.symWorkItemIteration);[lf][lf]def canceledUd = ThisJobData.getBulkUserDataString("Canceled");[lf]def isCancelled = canceledUd != null && canceledUd.equalsIgnoreCase("true");[lf][lf]def soID = (String) SymbolTable.symReference;[lf][lf]if (isCancelled) {[lf] Milestone.triggerMilestone(ClientContext, "CancelServiceOrder", soID);[lf] //work.cancel("Service order cancelled");[lf][lf]}
